summary: TAKA TAKE RECALL    THE RECALL FOR THE AIRBAG IN MY VEHICLE WAS ISSUED MAY 23, 2016. IT HAS BEEN NEARLY NINE MONTHS WITH FURTHER CONTACT FROM TOYOTA MOTORS. I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW THE STATUS OF THIS REPLACEMENT PROCESS. THE SAFETY OF OCCUPANTS IN MY VEHICLE IS GREATLY THREATEN BY THESE DELAYS. PLEASE HELP WITH INCREASING THE SPEED OF THIS PROCESS.    THANK YOU,    JEREMY
